resources.string: Speech
Train your voice
To start demonstration say \"oh mighty computer\".
Say \"digits\", \"forecast\" or \"phones\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example.
To try recognition of digits: say something like \"one two three four five\".
To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\".
To try phonetic recognition say anything.
Info
Are you sure you want to continue?
Allow Permission
For the app to make phone calls for you, allow the permissions
Permission denied to allow the app make calls, please allow
To use this feature, allow the permissions in settings
For the app to make send sms for you, allow the permissions
Permission denied to allow the app send sms, please allow
To use this feature, allow the permissions in settings
For the app to recognize your voice and store metadata, allow the permissions
Permission denied to allow the app to recognize your voice and store metadata, please allow
